Homepage > Electromagnet > Instructions page 2

Materials needed:

  • Over 2 ft. Insulated copper wire (more can make it stronger)
  • 1 Iron rod (long and thin, yet sturdy ones work best)
  • 1 ft. Duct tape
  • 1 Lantern battery
  • 1 pair of Wire cutters
  • 1 Compass (to test it)
  • (optional) 1 Switch and wire adapting tools
  • (optional) Rubber gloves

To the Directions
